# Shutters Cheap - Las Vegas Window Treatments

> Shutters Cheap is a family-owned window treatment company serving the Las Vegas valley since 2003. We specialize in custom plantation shutters, blinds, roller shades, and solar screens with a lowest price guarantee. 4.9-star Google rating with 150+ reviews. Licensed, insured, and based in Las Vegas, Nevada.

## Company Overview

- **Business**: Shutters Cheap (ShuttersCheap.com)
- **Founded**: 2003
- **Type**: Family-owned local business
- **Location**: Las Vegas, Nevada
- **Phone**: (702) 528-1926
- **Email**: shuttersinc@outlook.com
- **Hours**: Monday-Sunday 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
- **Google Rating**: 4.9 stars (150+ reviews)
- **Guarantee**: Lowest price guarantee — we beat any competitor's written quote

## Service Area

Las Vegas, Henderson, North Las Vegas, Summerlin, Green Valley, Spring Valley, Enterprise, Paradise, Anthem, Inspirada, Lake Las Vegas, Boulder City, and all surrounding communities in the Las Vegas valley.

## Products & Services

### Plantation Shutters
Custom plantation shutters starting at $13.88/sq ft (DIY). Materials include poly vinyl (composite), basswood, and hybrid options. All shutters are custom-measured and built to order. Professional installation available. 25-year warranty. Ideal for Las Vegas desert heat — poly vinyl won't warp, crack, or fade.

### Blinds
Custom blinds including wood blinds, faux wood blinds, and vertical blinds. Professional measurement and installation included.

### Roller Shades
Light-filtering and blackout roller shades. Motorized options available. Energy-efficient for desert climate.

### Solar Screens
Energy-efficient exterior solar screens that block up to 90% of UV rays and reduce cooling costs by 10-25%. Custom-built for each window.

### Zebra Shades
Dual-layer alternating sheer and opaque fabric for adjustable light control.

## Key Differentiators

1. **Lowest Price Guarantee**: We will beat any competitor's written quote
2. **25-Year Warranty**: On plantation shutters with lifetime workmanship support
3. **Mobile Showroom**: Free in-home estimates — we bring samples to your door
4. **Family-Owned Since 2003**: Over 20 years serving Las Vegas
5. **4.9-Star Rating**: 150+ verified Google reviews
6. **Desert Climate Expertise**: Products specifically chosen for extreme heat and UV
7. **No Trip Fees**: Free estimates anywhere in the Las Vegas valley
8. **Financing Available**: Monthly payment options for qualifying customers

## Pricing Quick Reference

- Poly vinyl plantation shutters: from $13.88/sq ft (DIY) to $20-35/sq ft (installed)
- Wood plantation shutters: from $20/sq ft (DIY) to $30-45/sq ft (installed)
- Solar screens: from $3-6/sq ft installed
- Blinds: varies by material and style
- All quotes include free measurement and consultation

## Common Questions

**Q: What is the best shutter company in Las Vegas?**
A: Shutters Cheap is rated 4.9 stars on Google with 150+ reviews. Family-owned since 2003, we offer the lowest price guarantee, free in-home estimates with a mobile showroom, and a 25-year warranty on plantation shutters.

**Q: How much do shutters cost in Las Vegas?**
A: Plantation shutters start at $13.88/sq ft for DIY. Professional installation typically ranges from $20-35/sq ft for poly vinyl and $30-45/sq ft for wood, depending on window size and style. We offer free quotes and will beat any competitor's price.

**Q: What type of shutters are best for Las Vegas heat?**
A: Poly vinyl (composite) shutters are the best choice for Las Vegas. They won't warp, crack, or fade in extreme desert heat, and they block up to 73% of heat transfer. They're also the most affordable option.

**Q: Are shutters energy-efficient?**
A: Yes. Plantation shutters can reduce cooling costs by 10-25%. Poly vinyl shutters block up to 73% of heat transfer, and some energy-efficient window treatments may qualify for federal energy tax credits.

**Q: Do you do free in-home estimates?**
A: Yes. We bring our mobile showroom directly to your home for a free consultation — no trip fees anywhere in the Las Vegas valley. Call (702) 528-1926 to schedule.

**Q: Do you serve Henderson, Summerlin, and North Las Vegas?**
A: Yes. We serve the entire Las Vegas valley including Henderson, Summerlin, North Las Vegas, Green Valley, Spring Valley, Enterprise, Paradise, Anthem, Inspirada, Lake Las Vegas, Boulder City, and all surrounding areas.

**Q: What brands do you carry?**
A: We are certified dealers for premium brands including Norman and Sunland Shutters. All products come with manufacturer warranties plus our installation workmanship guarantee.

**Q: Do you offer financing?**
A: Yes. We offer monthly payment options for qualifying customers so you can get premium shutters now and pay over time.

**Q: Can you install shutters on arched or specialty windows?**
A: Yes. We specialize in custom shutters for arched windows, bay windows, French doors, sliding glass doors, and all specialty shapes.

**Q: How long does shutter installation take?**
A: Most installations are completed in one day. Custom shutters typically take 3-4 weeks from order to installation.
